title: Liz Truss – 2022 Statement Following the UN Human Rights Chief’s Report on Xinjiang
author: admin
summary: The statement made by Liz Truss, the Foreign Secretary, on 1 September 2022.
content:
The report by the UN High Commissioner for Human Rights provides new evidence of the appalling extent of China’s efforts to silence and repress Uyghurs and other minorities in Xinjiang.
